title: Bug 4971: Incorrect package name in 'copy package'
description: Bug 4971: When performing the 'copy package' operation in Eclipse JDT, the package name shown is '2031. org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui' instead of 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui'.
OB: When performing the 'copy package' operation, the package name shown is '2031. org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui' instead of 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui'.
EB: The package name should be shown as 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui' during the 'copy package' operation.
SR:
To reproduce this issue: 
1. Open Eclipse JDT. 
2. Navigate to the package you want to copy. 
3. Right-click on the package and select 'Copy'. 
4. Right-click on the destination folder where you want to copy the package to. 
5. Select 'Paste'. 
6. Observe the package name shown during the 'copy package' operation.
